review: Love it!  As more and more apps appear the chromecast gets better and better!  What a bargain and with some of the "aftermarket" apps that are out there the chromecast is a must have.  I have mine connected to my tablet and our cell phone and it even works with out laptops.I recently found that you can take it and connect it to multiple networks without having to do the reconnect procedure when you bring it back home.  This makes for a great birthday present and it is really easy to use so even the non-techie can figure it out.

review: This doesn't do anything my roku couldn't do and it's much more of a pain to use. Yes you can use a laptop or smart phone to queue it but then that device is also playing the show at the same time. Honestly don't understand all of the marketing hype about this.
